helpers

Class MenuBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • helpers.MenuBuilder

  • public class MenuBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    This class aids in the building of menus and can display them in one of two ways. The first is without a banner and the other is with a banner. The banner will surround the title with '*' whereas the other just separates the title from the list. It prints the menu options in the form of an ordered list.
    Author:
    RossWeinstein

      Constructors

      MenuBuilder(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String... options)
      Constructs a new menu with a title and all possible options as Strings

      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getMenuItems()
      Returns each option within the menu

      java.lang.String getOrderedListOfMenuItems()
